lead_paragraph: While the Washington Wizards try to promote John Wall's case for the NBA All-Star Game, Kyrie Irving put on a show to illustrate why the Cleveland Cavaliers think he should get the nod.

headline.print_headline: James, Irving Lead Cavaliers to 5th Straight Victory
headline.main: James, Irving Lead Cavaliers to 5th Straight Victory

snippet: While the Washington Wizards try to promote John Wall's case for the NBA All-Star Game, Kyrie Irving put on a show to illustrate why the Cleveland Cavaliers think he should get the nod....
